snippet: Stocks opened higher and then fell for much of the session, but they edged closer to break-even levels in the last hour of trading.
abstract: Stock market searches for direction and falls, as investors remain uncertain when the Federal Reserve will start to taper its economic stimulus.
lead_paragraph: Stocks opened higher and then fell for much of the session, but they edged closer to break-even levels in the last hour of trading.

headline.main: Mixed Close for Market After Upbeat Jobs Data
headline.print_headline: Mixed Close for Market After Upbeat Jobs Data
